Shivah::

"The data of her programming has been destroyed with the 
reprogrmation process"said Shivah"and I suggest you that leave right 
now our territory or you will be destroyed right now!!"

While shivah said that the external defences of the Area where Azure 
Blade was, appeared 

Shivah said "Maximal or not you will be treatment as enemy, so get 
lost while you can save your skin, and don't mind that you can rescue 
the gilr 'cause before you can help her, she's going to die with a 
horrible death. "


--- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> AzureBlade slightly smiled:
> You do not get it. I am NOT a maximal. I am a Silver Wing. our 
group 
> is not related in any ways except philosophy with maximals. She is 
a 
> maximal spy who infiltrated us and betrayed us. We are renegades 
the 
> maximals wish to hide. But since you tell me she was reprogrammed, 
I 
> shall leave her to you. My only request in this case would be that 
you 
> allow me to bring back the data about her reprogramming.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Shivah:::
> > 
> > Shivah opened his comm link to Lunapine "Don't press me Wolf!!" 
said 
> > the male "Don't press your luck and be careful with your words... 
I 
> > can command the death of the three bots that we hold here... I 
won't 
> > free him until you give us the antivirus at least."
> > 
> > While shivah waited Lunarpine answer he open comm link with Azure 
> > Blade "SO the lady is a betraying bot? You're lying me 'cause my 
> > computer said that she has a maximal signature... well If she 
like 
> it 
> > or not she's now loyal to Predacon's cause... and why are 
maximals 
> > now interested to rescue an insignificant Scout while a good 
warrior 
> > had been captured???? If Maximal said that they are loyals each 
> other 
> > why they don't act according to their words? "
